channel.title: Salt Flats on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Salt Flats on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 410
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 410 - US-93 Alt./West Wendover/Ely. This is the last exit in Nevada on I-80 east. This exit is the western end of the West Wendover/Wendover business loop. The casinos in West Wendover and the salt flats beyond are visible.
